fulltext:
HOANG VAN VIET 
Full Stack Developer 
Date of birth: 
June 09, 1996 
Gender: 
Male 
Phone: 
+84 0935148745 
Email: 
viethoang.forwork@gmail.com 
Linkedin: 
https://www.linkedin.com/in/helllockk/ 
SUMMARY 
I am a full stack developer with 2 years of experience in Java technologies (which includes 1 year of 
experience in Front-End Web Development). 
Learning new languages and technologies is what I am passionate about. I am considered a team-player 
because I like to help other and tend to work well within the group. I can also do some mentoring tasks and 
do code reviews for other team members. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Programming Languages 
- 
Java, Javascript, Typescript 
- 
HTML, CSS 
Database Management Systems 
- 
PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server 
- 
MongoDB, AWS DynamoDB 
Version Control 
- 
Git 
- 
Bitbucket, Github, Gerrit 
Frameworks/Platforms 
- 
Spring Framework, JPA, Hibernate 
- 
ReactJS 
- 
NodeJS 
- 
Webpack, Babel, ES6, ES7 
Amazon Web Services 
- 
AWS Lambda 
- 
AWS Appsync 
- 
AWS DynamoDB 
DevOps 
- 
Docker, Jenkins CI 
- 
Linux, Ubuntu, CentOS 
EDUCATION 
09/2014 – 06/2019 
Danang University Of Technology 
Major: Information Technology 
01/2017 – 07/2017 
Iviettech Training Center 
Professional Java Developer Course 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
MGM TECHNOLOGY PARTNERS GMBH  
6/2018 – now 
Title: Fullstack Developer 
Project:  Timension 
Description: the purpose of the app is to help people organize the company resources like 
employee, project, contract, role, time booking, notify the managers about things happen in the project 
Responsibilities: 
 
Set up the codebase of backend (Spring boot) and frontend (ReactJS) for other 
developers to code on it. 
 
Set up the servers to deploy the project using Docker. 
 
Set up the CI/CD process using Jenkins. 
 
Do coding tasks using Spring boot and ReactJS. 
 
Communicate with customer about the requirements. 
 
Do code review for other team members. 
Technologies used: Spring boot, Java, React, Webpack, Babel, Typescript, Postgresql, Docker, 
Jenkins, Gerrit. 
Accomplishment:  
 
Learned a lot about CI/CD process using Docker, Jenkins. 
 
I am the person who set up the codebase for everyone, this helped me to understand 
every line of configuration in the project and gained deeper knowledge about Maven, 
Spring boot than being dependent on the IDEs or just code on a already-created 
codebase. 
 
Improve the skills of analyzing the requirement from customer. 
 
Improved English skills a lot because of working in an international environment. 
CAPTCHA INC  
2/2018 – 5/2018 
Title: Software Developer 
Project: Captcha 
Description: help developers from many technologies (JSP, Struts, Angularjs, Angular, ReactJS) to 
easily implement the Captcha component (the product of the company) into their application. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Create code templates for implementing the Captcha in technologies: JSP, Struts, 
Angularjs, Angular). 
 
Create the React component to publish to npmjs.org, the other developers can just 
install the npm package and use the Captcha. 
 
Proof of my work: https://www.npmjs.com/package/reactjs-captcha 
Technologies used: React, Java, Javascript. 
Accomplishment :  
 
Knew and liked the way we think when working on a product for lots of users. 
 
Gained a little knowledge about Angularjs, Angular, Struts. 
 
Gained deep knowledge about React. 
LOGIGEAR CORPORATION 
9/2017 – 1/2018 
Title: Software Developer 
Project:  Company Resource Management 
Description: Maintain and upgrade the Company Resource Management system, refactor the 
authorization part, refactor the career role of all employees. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Create new pages for authorization using React. 
 
Understand and upgrade the authorization matrix. 
Technologies used: React, .Net, C#, SQL Server. 
Accomplishment: This is just the start of my career so I did not do so much work as the others, I 
used this time  to learn about the working process, the way we cooperate within the team and learned 
about the React. 
SOFT SKILLS 
- 
Communication in English 
- 
Teamwork, time management 
PASTIMES AND ACTIVITIES 
- 
I am keen on reading books, IT blogs, Medium and Quora in my free time. My favorite IT books are: 
Clean Code, Cracking The Coding Interview. 
- 
I am also participate in stackoverflow.com to learn more from seniors around the world - 
https://stackoverflow.com/users/8615753/viet-hoang

experiences.detail:
Project: Timension Description: the purpose of the app is to help people organize the company resources like employee, project, contract, role, time booking, notify the managers about things happen in the project
Responsibilities: Set up the codebase of backend (Spring boot) and frontend (ReactJS) for other developers to code on it.
Set up the servers to deploy the project using Docker. Set up the CI/CD process using Jenkins. Do coding tasks using Spring boot and ReactJS. Communicate with customer about the requirements.
Do code review for other team members.
Technologies used: Spring boot, Java, React, Webpack, Babel, Typescript, Postgresql, Docker, Jenkins, Gerrit. Accomplishment: Learned a lot about CI/CD process using Docker, Jenkins. I am the person who set up the codebase for everyone, this helped me to understand every line of configuration in the project and gained deeper knowledge about Maven, Spring boot than being dependent on the IDEs or just code on a already-created codebase.
Improve the skills of analyzing the requirement from customer.
Improved English skills a lot because of working in an international environment.

Project: Captcha Description: help developers from many technologies (JSP, Struts, Angularjs, Angular, ReactJS) to easily implement the Captcha component (the product of the company) into their application.
Responsibilities: Create code templates for implementing the Captcha in technologies: JSP, Struts, Angularjs, Angular). Create the React component to publish to npmjs.org, the other developers can just install the npm package and use the Captcha. Proof of my work: https://www.npmjs.com/package/reactjs-captcha
Technologies used: React, Java, Javascript. Accomplishment : Knew and liked the way we think when working on a product for lots of users.
Gained a little knowledge about Angularjs, Angular, Struts. Gained deep knowledge about React.

Project: Company Resource Management Description: Maintain and upgrade the Company Resource Management system, refactor the authorization part, refactor the career role of all employees.
Responsibilities: Create new pages for authorization using React. Understand and upgrade the authorization matrix.
Technologies used: React, .Net, C#, SQL Server. Accomplishment: This is just the start of my career so I did not do so much work as the others, I used this time to learn about the working process, the way we cooperate within the team and learned about the React.
